data.title: Gateway Academy Westminster
meta_keywords: Welcome to the website for Gateway Academy Westminster
data.meta_description: Welcome to the website for Gateway Academy Westminster, London
data.text:
A very warm welcome to Gateway Academy’s Website.

Gateway Academy is a three-form entry, vibrant and successful community primary school.

We thrive on a culture of high expectations where everyone is committed to making a real difference. We aim to give our children the very best possible start to their education, developing personal aspiration and a lifelong love of learning. Our children, their education and welfare lies at the heart of everything we do. At Gateway Academy, we believe that children thrive when the entire school community – pupils, parents, staff, governors, and the wider local community, come together. We strongly value the relationship we have with our parents and recognise that effective partnerships are essential. Please contact the School Office if you require any further information or would like to arrange a visit to the Academy.

Mrs Breslin and Mrs Cleary Co-Headteachers

Term Dates

Friday 9 August 2024

Dear Parents/Carers, our uniform suppliers have contacted us to say that sales for our school are much lower than other local schools. Please ensure your child/children are dressed in full Gateway uniform for their return in September.

Here is the link for you to purchase:

https://myclothing.com/collections/gateway-academy-19553

You can also visit the School Life Section for full details of what the uniform consists of.

Friday 26 July 2024

Dear Y6 Parents and Carers, please go to the Teaching and Learning section on our website and then click on End of Year Celebrations for access to the photos and videos from Leavers Assembly and the Y6 show. Please email parentcontact@gateway-academy.co.uk for a copy of the password in order to access them.
